snippet: It wasn't exciting, but for a candidate already leading by double digits in most New Hampshire polls, perhaps calm is just what he needed.
abstract: It wasn't exciting, but for a candidate already leading by double digits in most New Hampshire polls, perhaps calm is just what he needed.
lead_paragraph: At one of the earlier debates, Mitt Romney's rivals were able to get under his skin. They rattled him so much that he at one point put his hand on Gov. Rick Perry's shoulder.

headline.main: Cool, Calm Mitt Romney at Debate
